articles.author: Andy Robinson
articles.title: Sources: Nintendo showed Switch 2 demos at Gamescom | VGC - Video Games Chronicle
articles.description: The company is understood to have held private tech demos, ahead of an expected 2024 launch…
articles.content:
Nintendo showed off tech demos for its Nintendo Switch successor behind closed doors at Gamescom, its understood.
Thats according to a new report from Eurogamer, which VGC can corroborate via our ow… [+1969 chars]
